What OS Are U Running? Is It Win Vista Or Win 7 Cuz If UAC IS Not disabled.. The Registry Will Not Get Imported ...

What are Ur System Specs? Do You Have A Video Card?

Note: Some PCs equipped with the VIA KT133a chipset might encounter problems with Command & Conquer Generals Zero Hour.
